title: Exploring Sustainability: Science Learning Through Augmented Reality Gaming

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and general understanding of sustainability
context.additional_context: Blended class utilizing smartphone-based augmented reality games (ARG), combining classroom theory learning with outdoor mission-based project activities

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three causes of climate change and solutions through augmented reality games.
Learners evaluate their ability to design sustainable lifestyles while performing collaborative missions within the game.
Learners analyze ARG (Alternate Reality Game) data logs to propose strategies for reducing environmental impact at individual and group levels.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
